display_long_description:
TritonXR turns ANY space into a dynamic combat arena with your friends - duck behind your living room couch to reload, throw a grenade down your hallway or jump over your bed to avoid an attack.

Battle as many friends as you can fit in your space, customise your environment, choose your loadout, and experience VR like never before. Play in either our Immersive Mode (full VR), Mixed Reality (hybrid) or the Real Life mode that lets you feel like you’re truly battling IRL.

TritonXR is as simple to set up as it is fun to play. Our intuitive mixed-reality map editor lets you quickly create combat arenas in your physical space. Add walls, props, weapons and more!

No friends? No problem. Our brand new Survival Mode lets you battle flying foes that can navigate around your space, and creepy crawlies that can climb any piece of furniture in your room. See how long you can survive in singleplayer or multiplayer mode!

The next generation of Mixed Reality is here - turn any playspace into the ultimate multiplayer combat arena in TritonXR!
